This website uses cookies
We use cookies to help our site run smoothly. Feel free to review our Privacy Policy for further details.

About
Cookies are small text files that can be used by websites to make a user's experience more efficient.

The law states that we can store cookies on your device if they are strictly necessary for the operation of this site. For all other types of cookies we need your permission.

This site uses different types of cookies. Some cookies are placed by third party services that appear on our pages.

You can at any time change or withdraw your consent from the Cookie Declaration on our website.

Learn more about who we are, how you can contact us and how we process personal data in our Privacy Policy.

Please state your consent ID and date when you contact us regarding your consent.

Frequently Asked Questions

  • When you create a video, the duration is deducted from the total minutes available in your plan. The length of the video is rounded up to the nearest 15-second interval. For example, a 1-minute and 10-second video will consume 1 minute and 15 seconds.

  • Minutes do not accumulate, they are renewed every month and unused minutes become void.

  • 1. Click the menu on the bottom left and click âBillingâ
    2. Click the pen icon and change the details.

  • It is important for us, as a company that enables users to create AI-based content, that there is transparency about the synthetic nature of the videos they generate. This is also reflected in our ethical manifesto, available at https://www.d-id.com/ethics/. Note, a full-screen watermark appears for trial users.

  • To cancel your subscription, go to âBillingâ > âCancel planâ

  • If youâd like to delete your account, please contact support@d-id.com. Deleting your account will remove your access to D-ID, along with all your generated or translated videos, Agents, and stored data. If you decide to return, you can sign up again, but your previous data cannot be recovered.

  • You can switch from a monthly to a yearly plan anytime by simply choosing an annual plan. Thereâs no need to contact support.

    Similarly, you can also switch from a yearly to a monthly plan and the update will take effect at the end of your current billing cycle.

  • If you cancel your subscription, your plan will remain active until the end of the current billing period. Afterward, your account will be downgraded. As a free user, if you do not use D-ID for 6 months, your data will be deleted, but we will notify you via email before this happens.

  • Login to D-ID, go to your Account page, and generate your API key.

  • Minutes used via the API are deducted from the same balance as your web version of D-ID.

  • API documentation is available at the Developer Hub.
